summary: The U.S. government asks Mr. Moto to go to Puerto Rico to investigate diamond smuggling after an earlier investigator is murdered.
cast: Peter Lorre|Jean Hersholt|Amanda Duff|Warren Hymer|Richard Lane|Leon Ames|Douglass Dumbrille|Charles D. Brown|Paul Harvey|Robert Lowery|Eddie Marr|Harry Woods|Willie Best|Ward Bond|Nick Borgani|Paul Cristo|Walter Deming|Lester Dorr|Donald Douglas|Jimmie Dundee|Ralph Dunn|Juan Duval|Neely Edwards|Harold Goodwin|Grace Hayle|Oscar 'Dutch' Hendrian|Selmer Jackson|Edward Keane|Al Kikume|George Magrill|Tony Martelli|Louis Mercier|Lucille Miller|Fred Rapport|Renie Riano|Suzanne Ridgway|Gloria Roy|Lee Shumway|Edwin Stanley|Jack Stoney|Harry Strang|Max Wagner|Ray Walker
title: Mr. Moto in Danger Island
